Question: Taney issued the writ, thereby ordering Merryman's release, but this person ignored it.
Hints: On June 19, 1862, endorsed by this person, Congress passed an act banning slavery on all federal territory.
In 1840, this person became engaged to Mary Todd, who was from a wealthy slave-holding family in Lexington, Kentucky.
Then and throughout the war, this person came under heavy, often vituperative attack from antiwar Democrats, called Copperheads.
